Description: Small fragment of undyed wool with a small roundel in purple wool and undyed linen; main cloth includes a continuous, supplementary weft of thick cream wool, ratio of 3-6 main weft:1 supplementary weft; abstract geometric design within rounde; supplementary weft also surrounds the roundels edges; plain weave: warp-undyed wool (S/c.10), weft-undyed wool (S), supplementary weft- cream wool (S spun Z ply); tapestry on single threads: warp-undyed wool (S/c.10), weft-purple wool (S/c.46), linen (S spun Z ply); edges cut); purple weft is a mix of red and blue fibres; probably from a tunic
Curator's comments: Unreg 50; found 1988? in a Keeper's Office;
